How does it affect you?
The symptoms include 
flashbacks,	nightmares,	panic	
attacks, numbed emotions, 
sleeping problems, irritable, 
angry and irrational behaviour.
How to get help:
Talk to your midwife or health 
visitor, about your experience 
and feelings.

coercive control
